item.description:
Hey Everyone!

Sorry for the last minute change of location, but I'm changing the location to a more exciting venue.

"Bills Bar" is more centrally located, which is right on Lansdowne Street. The address is 5.5 Lansdowne Street, Boston, MA 02215

If you have any questions & concerns, please let me know. You can reach me on my cell phone at 617.594.6730.

Thanks.

-Ozzie

http://www.billsbar.c...
http://www.billsbar.c...

By the way folks, make sure you are there on time!

Thanks.

-Ozzie

For more information, see http://www.billsbar.c...
